TopicTitle: Lets make the jump to light speed...

Articles.Content:
Ok so, i've only had this game a few days and its awesome. But there are some things I would like to see in 0.18 and future versions.

1. Multiplayer: Yes I know theres multiple people synced single player but that is just not multiplayer.

2. Light speed: transportation to different galaxies and you can discover new planets other players have not found.

3. Its war!: Everyone seems to want to be able to have a war driven planet or what not, I think that would be cool to.

4. Satellites and Rovers: If theres war it would be awesome if you could drive a rover on a hostile planet, satellites would come in so they could map out people and see if theres any missiles or enemy spaceships coming in.

Thats it! Thanks for reading (please tell me if I put this in the wrong place on forums as this is my first post.)
Pint number 4 sounds good but the rest, err, they might not make those. Although Welcome to the forums!
In regards to Point 3, I believe Squad said they would not include anything like that in the game. I may be mistaken though.

2. FTL drives are planned, if I recall correctly.

3. Squad said no weaponry.

4. Would make for a great addition to the game.

Why is this thread in the add-on section?

There are already a few great rover/satellite mods, as well as a working warp drive mod. Use the search function in the addon release and project showcase thread. Multiplayer is impossible, how do you make timewarp possible for multiple people? Well I suppose you could put the server near a black hole or something...free relativity right?! Also, the game currently makes the player the center of the universe. Something about more accurate physics that way I heard? So obviously you can't have multiple universes.

I think the best we could hope for is a co-op mode where you get to ride-along with a friend in a capsule, then tear up duna in rovers or something. Holy crap I just had a brain blast!!! Gonna post to suggestions now!!!!!
